Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: படைகுடி கூழ்அமைச்சு நட்பரண் ஆறும் உடையான் அரசருள் ஏறு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: An army, people, wealth, a minister, friends, fort: six things- Who owns them all, a lion lives amid the kings.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A majestic, powerful king, visualized as a lion among men ('அரசருள் ஏறு'), sits confidently on a throne.
Layered_Composition.Midground: Surrounding his throne are six radiant, glowing symbols representing the six essential elements of a kingdom: a Sword (Army - படை), a crowd of people (Subjects - குடி), a sheaf of golden grain (Wealth/Food - கூழ்), a wise scroll (Ministry - அமைச்சு), two clasped hands (Allies - நட்பு), and a strong fortress tower (Fortification - அரண்).
Layered_Composition.Background: A prosperous and sprawling kingdom under a golden sun, showing the result of possessing these six elements.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A powerful king who possesses all six essential elements of statecraft, making him a formidable and complete ruler, a 'lion among kings'.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The six glowing symbols are the core visual metaphor. The king's leonine aura or features subtly reinforce the 'lion among kings' idea.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A radiant, golden light emanates from the king and the six symbols, bathing the scene in a regal and prosperous glow. The palette is dominated by golds, royal blues, and rich reds.

Technical_Cues.Camera: Centered, low-angle wide shot, emphasizing the king's majesty and the importance of the six elements surrounding him.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic with painterly effects for the symbols to give them a divine quality.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Volumetric lighting, radiant glow, strong but warm key light on the king.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Epic fantasy art, historical realism with symbolic elements.

Cultural_Anchors: The six elements of a kingdom

Negative_Prompt: weak king, missing symbols, dark or stormy background, modern attire, text artifacts, cartoonish.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the design of the six glowing symbols.
